pullRequest.title: Consent Service : Replace Model BO with Entity classes from common service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Data integrity checks for entities completed in PR #713. In this PR, I'm replacing the old model objects with entities from common-service.
Also, added DataSharingStatus enum as suggested in technical discussion meeting.
AppVersionInfoBO and LoginAttemptsBO classes were unused, hence removed.

commit.message:
Data Integrity - Integration with Consent Service
